articles.title: Cramer's week ahead: This is the time to speculate - CNBC
articles.description: "You've got my blessing to buy stocks into weakness as we move closer to the long-awaited vaccine," the "Mad Money" host said.
articles.content:
With a Covid-19 vaccine use authorization from U.S. drug regulators imminent, CNBC's Jim Cramer said Friday the time is ripe to take on some risk in the market.
"If you want to speculate, this is th… [+5455 chars]
